input.sentences: the students sat in the audience while listening to the graduation speeches .
all of the students were so excited to graduate .
some of the students took pictures to remember the event .
their families were there to support them .
everyone had cameras to record the graduation .
output.sentences: The students gave their graduation speeches on saturday.
All of the students who graduated were very excited.
The students will always remember this day by looking at pictures
The students couldn't have done it without the love and support of their families
Lots of family members recorded the graduation on their cameras.
